name: CreateAccountHighlight
description:
Create a highlight for a specified account.

This tool is used to create a highlight for an account, using either an internal account ID in UUID format or an external ID in string format. It should be called when there is a need to add or update a highlight for an account.

parameters.name: account_identifier
parameters.description: The ID (UUID) or external ID (string) of the account for the highlight.

value_schema.description: The ID or external ID of the account that the highlight belongs to.

parameters.name: highlight_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'content_html' for the highlight's HTML content, and 'expires_at' for the expiration timestamp (optional, RFC3339 format).

content_html.description: The HTML content for this highlight.

expires_at.description: Optional RFC3339 timestamp of when this highlight will expire.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The ID or external ID of the account that the highlight belongs to.
